verses.verse: The <S%G602>Revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> to <S%G1166>show<s%> unto <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1722>shortly<s%> <S%G5034><s%> come to <S%G1096>pass;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> and <S%G4591>signified<s%> it <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> unto <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2491>John:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> bore <S%G3140>record<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of all things <S%G3745>that<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%>.

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%G314>reads<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they that <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of this <S%G4394>prophecy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> those things which are <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G1722>it<s%>: <S%G846><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> is at <S%G1451>hand<s%>.

<S%G2491>John<s%> to <S%G1577>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> which are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> him which <S%G5607>is<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> which <S%G2258>was<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> which is to <S%G2064>come<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, who is the <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G3144>witness<s%>, and the first <S%G4416>born<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>. To him that <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3068>washed<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>,

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, he <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3507>clouds<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they also <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1574>pierced<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5443>kindreds<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2875>wail<s%> because <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. Even <S%G3483>so<s%>, <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1>Alpha<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5598>Omega<s%>, the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5056>ending<s%>, <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, which <S%G5607>is<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> which <S%G2258>was<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> which is to <S%G2064>come<s%>, the <S%G3841>Almighty<s%>.

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>, who <S%G2532>also<s%> am <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4791>companion<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G3520>isle<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3963>Patmos<s%>, <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G2960>Lord<s%>'s <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> of a <S%G4536>trumpet<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1994>turned<s%> to <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3748>that<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> having <S%G1994>turned<s%>, I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> golden <S%G5552>candlesticks<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks<s%> one <S%G3664>like<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with a garment down to the <S%G4158>foot<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4024>belted<s%> <S%G4314>about<s%> the <S%G3149>breasts<s%> with a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2223>belt<s%>.

<S%G846>His<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G2359>hair<s%> were <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> <S%G2053>wool<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> as <S%G5510>snow<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G1161>fire<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> fine <S%G5474>brass<s%>, as <S%G5613>if<s%> they <S%G4448>burned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2575>furnace<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> <S%G5204>of<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1607>went<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1366>twoedged<s%> <S%G4501>sword<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3799>appearance<s%> was <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G5316>shines<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>strength<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2007>laid<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>; <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%>:

I am he that <S%G2198>lives<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G1519%G99999>for<s%> <S%G165>evermore<s%>, <S%G281>Amen<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of <S%G86>hell<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2532>death<s%>.

<S%G1125>Write<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1492>seen<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G1096%G99999>be<s%> <S%G5023>hereafter<s%>;
